# perceptualUnitRect

**Instance Property**

Returns a rectangle that bounds the shape in such a way that viewers perceive it as having the same size and position as a unit rectangle.

## Declaration

```swift
var perceptualUnitRect: CGRect { get }
```
title: perceptualUnitRect
